## MySQLConnectionOptions.dateStrings property

Return date values as strings instead of converting them to `Date` objects.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dateStrings?: false;
```

## Remarks

The framework relies on date values returned as `Date` objects, therefore this option must be `false` or omitted.
